First of all, you need to get [http://sourceforge.net/projects/mingw/files/Automated%20MinGW%20Installer/mingw-get-inst/ mingw-get] and install c++ compiler.

Download [http://www.boost.org/users/download/ boost] and extract it in \Program Files\boost, so you have \Program Files\boost\boost`_<ver>`.

Install [http://www.cmake.org/cmake/resources/software.html CMake].

Download and extract anywhere devel versions of [http://www.libsdl.org/download-1.2.php libsdl], [http://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_image/ libsdl-image], [http://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_mixer/ libsdl-mixer], [http://www.libsdl.org/projects/SDL_ttf/ libsdl-ttf].

Then add MinGW\bin and sdl`*` directories to [http://publib.boulder.ibm.com/iseries/v5r2/ic2924/books/5445775168.htm Windows path].

Run {{{mingw-get install mingw32-make mingw32-gmp mingw32-libintl}}}.

Run cmd and cd to \Program Files\boost\boost`_<ver>`. Run bootstrap. Replace `using msvc ;` with `using gcc ;` in file project-config.jam. Run .\bjam.

Generate Makefile with CMake and run mingw32-make.
